name: Game Controller
description:
Game Controller is a mix of an old school 2D shoot ‘em up and a text based adventure. It is the product of a 48 hours Game Jam

The idea is, that the number of deaths you suffer in the shoot’em up part, decides which way in the forking path story of the adventure you will take. So in the end you control a game by playing an other game.

Credits

  • Tim Schuchert - Sound, Graphics, Story
  • Oliver Buse- Story, Voice Over
  • Milas Baumgarten - Programming

Tools

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio
  • Microsoft Excel
  • Microsoft Word
  • Photoshop
